prompts.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this {{itemType}}?
prompts.inDev: This feature is still in development.

prompts.alreadyRegistered: You have already created an account.
prompts.chooseAuthFlow: You can send this message anonymously right now or create an account to unlock more features. Which would you prefer to do?
prompts.signUpToChat: Log in or sign up to chat and make decisions with other members of this server.
prompts.enterCredentials: Enter your email and password to access your account
prompts.enterDetails: Enter your details to create your new account
prompts.logOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
prompts.upgradeAccount: Turn your anonymous session into a permanent account

descriptions.confirmLogOut: Use this dialog to log out of your account.

errors.passwordTooLong: Password must be at most 64 characters long
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.shortName: Username must be at least 2 characters
Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.invalidName: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
errors.shortDisplayName: Display name must be at least 4 characters

prompts.logInToViewProfile: Log in or sign up to view profiles
prompts.registerToViewOtherProfiles: You need to register to view other user profiles

descriptions.basicInfoDescription: Provide the basic details for your proposal
descriptions.create: Submit a proposal to discuss and vote on.
descriptions.roleAttributesDescription: Modify the role's name and color
descriptions.roleMembersDescription: Add or remove members from the role
descriptions.rolesPermissionsDescription: Configure the roles and permissions changes
descriptions.selectRoleDescription: Choose the role you want to modify

prompts.noVotingAfterClose: This proposal has been closed and can no longer be voted on.
prompts.noVotingAfterRatification: This proposal has been ratified and can no longer be voted on.
prompts.ratifiedSuccess: This proposal has been ratified! ðŸŽ‰
prompts.signInToVote: Sign in to vote on proposals

errors.registerToCreateNonTestProposals: Anonymous users can only create test proposals. Please register to create other proposal types.
errors.changeRoleRequiresChanges: Proposals to change roles must include at least 1 change to the selected role.
errors.testProposalRequiresBody: Test proposals must include a body
errors.generalProposalRequiresBody: General proposals must include a body

prompts.inviteRequired: You need to be invited or logged in before you can send messages.

headers.channelSettingsDescription: Edit the settings for this channel.

prompts.startConversation: Start a conversation around a topic or idea.

errors.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum file size is 8MB.
errors.tooManyImages: You can upload a maximum of 5 images.

descriptions.attachedImage: This is an attached image enlarged for viewing.

descriptions.createEvents: Allows members to create and plan events.
descriptions.createInvites: Allows members to invite new people to the server.
descriptions.manageChannels: Allows members to create, edit, or delete channels.
descriptions.manageComments: Allows members to remove or hide comments by other members.
descriptions.manageEvents: Allows members to remove or edit events created by other members.
descriptions.manageInstanceRoles: Allows members to create new instance roles as well as edit or delete other instance roles.
descriptions.manageInstanceSettings: Allows members to make changes to the instance's settings.
descriptions.manageInvites: Allows members to create or delete invite links for the server.
descriptions.managePosts: Allows members to remove or hide posts by other members.
descriptions.manageQuestions: Allows members to create, edit, or delete membership questions.
descriptions.manageRules: Allows members to create, edit, or delete rules for the server.
descriptions.manageServerRoles: Allows members to create new roles as well as edit or delete other roles.
descriptions.manageServerSettings: Allows members to make changes to the server's settings.
descriptions.manageServers: Allows members to create new servers as well as edit or delete other servers.
descriptions.removeMembers: Allows members to remove other members from the server.
descriptions.removeProposals: Allows members to remove proposals posted by other members.

descriptions.decisionMakingModel: Choose from consensus, consent, or majority vote to determine how decisions are made in the server.
descriptions.ratificationThreshold: Set the minimum percentage of positive votes required for a proposal to pass.
descriptions.quorumEnabled: Require a minimum number of members to participate before a proposal can pass.
descriptions.quorumThreshold: Set the minimum percentage of eligible members that must participate for a proposal to be valid.
descriptions.disagreementsLimit: Set a limit for the acceptable number of disagreements allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
descriptions.abstainsLimit: Set a limit for the acceptable number of abstains allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
descriptions.votingTimeLimit: Set a time limit for how long proposals can be voted on before they're closed or ratified.
descriptions.anonymousUsersEnabled: Allow users to participate without creating an account or providing personal information.

explanations.decisionMakingModel: The process used to make decisions in the server, which can be based on consensus, consent, or majority vote.
explanations.ratificationThreshold: The minimum percentage of positive votes required for a proposal to pass.
explanations.quorumEnabled: Whether a minimum participation threshold is required for proposals to be valid.
explanations.quorumThreshold: The minimum percentage of eligible members that must participate for a proposal to be valid.
explanations.disagreementsLimit: The maximum number of disagreements allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
explanations.abstainsLimit: The maximum number of abstains allowed for a proposal to still be able to pass.
explanations.votingTimeLimit: The minimum amount of time proposals can be voted on before they're closed or ratified.

errors.consentVotingTimeLimitRequired: Voting time limit is required for consent decision making.
errors.majorityVoteRatificationThreshold: Ratification threshold must be greater than 50% for majority vote.

form.name: Name
form.defaultServerDescription: New visitors and users without an invite start here.

prompts.switchServersDescription: Pick another server to jump to.

errors.nameLength: Name must be between 2 and 30 characters.
errors.slugLength: Slug must be between 2 and 30 characters.
errors.invalidSlug: Slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens, and cannot start or end with a hyphen.
errors.descriptionLength: Description must be at most 255 characters.
errors.noServersFoundDescription: You don't belong to any servers yet.

prompts.expiredOrInvalid: Your invite link is either expired or invalid.
prompts.inviteRequired: You need to be invited in order to sign up.
prompts.joinServerToStart: Join this server to start chatting, making decisions, and organizing with other members.
prompts.noInvites: No invites have been created yet.

messages.projectDescription1: Praxis is an open source messaging platform designed for collaborative decision making. Proposals take center stage, offering a diverse range of voting models, with consensus as the default.
messages.projectDescription2: With Praxis, communities are empowered to collectively shape crucial aspects such as server name, settings, roles, and the planning of real-world events. This flexibility allows for diverse and dynamic social structures tailored to meet the specific needs of your community as it evolves over time.
messages.inDev: This project is still in development and is not yet intended for serious use outside of testing or research purposes.

descriptions.navDrawer: Create a new room, join a room, or view your settings.
descriptions.navSheet: Navigate to your rooms, profile, and more.
